derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin communicant- 'sharing', from the verb communicare (see communicate)

entry.def: A communicant is a person in the Christian church who receives communion.

means.word_mean: 1. a person entitled to receive Communion

auth_sentence.content: This means that in the Orthodox Church babies and children are fully communicant members of the Church.
